mapper.select: select u.id as member_id, u.user_name, m.member_profile_url as snsProfile, f.file_path as memberProfileUrl, p.id as id, p.post_content, p.post_status, p.post_warning_status, p.created_datetime, p.updated_datetime, ujc.job_category, jc.job_name, p.likes_count from tbl_user u join tbl_member m on u.id = m.user_id join tbl_post p on m.user_id = p.member_id left join tbl_user_job_category ujc on u.id = ujc.user_id left join tbl_job_category jc on ujc.job_category = jc.id left join tbl_user_profile_file upf on u.id = upf.user_id left join tbl_file f on upf.file_id = f.id where p.post_status = 'active' and p.post_warning_status IN ('wait', 'hold') order by created_datetime desc limit #{rowCount} offset #{offset}
